attributes.action: STOP the SLAVERY, TORTURE and KILLING of AFRICANS in LIBYA!!!
attributes.additional_details:
BBC coverage “Libya migrant 'slave market' footage sparks outrage November 18, 2017”

Where is the world?': Libya responds to outrage over slave auctions
By Raja Razek and Lauren Said-Moorhouse, CNN

Updated 1553 GMT (2353 HKT) November 23, 2017
attributes.background: African are being sold as SLAVES in LIBYA. They are being TORTURED and KILLED each day. CNN and BBC has Written about it!! ‘The REST OF THE WORLD’ need to step in and DO SOMETHING!!
